value:
My armor's full of scratches. I got this
one here defending Border Mulan in a
siege years back.$k$pThe others are from my earliest days
as a knighted soldier. Each of these is
a story. Each one a mark of pride.

Keeping Princess Eirika safe from
harm is the right thing to do, not just
a service to our sworn ally, Renais.$k$pMy own Princess Tana feels the same.

In Askr, there are many Heroes of
different experience levels. I will
give them all I have to give.

I've known Syrene a long time—since
she first became an elite pegasus
knight. I know she has my back.

Acting alone out there in battle leads
only to chaos. We must consider how
our actions affect others.

I am Gilliam, an armored knight of
Frelia. I am to deliver these goods to
you in $Nf's stead.

This body was painstakingly sculpted
through consistent training. You will
not find a single weakness!

If we're discussing strength, none
of Frelia's armored knights can hope
to match me!

Even these muscles need rest every
now and then.

The armored knights of Frelia
understand a simple truth: a day
without training is a day wasted.

I am Gilliam. Been stationed on the
eastern front of Frelia. However, if
this is to be my new assignment...$k$pI swear to protect both this place
and you with all my strength.

I've been continuously impressed by
your adept show of ingenuity on the
battlefield, $Nu.$k$pIt really is a shame your body isn't as
hardy as your brain. Ho, how scrawny
those legs of yours are!$k$pFear not—a few days of Frelia's
resistance training and you'll be in
the best shape of your life!$k$pBe warned: this program is not for
the faint of heart. It will push every
single muscle, even your fingertips.$k$pMuscles are the very fiber of your
being as a knight, the thing that pulls
you together and gives you strength.$k$pIn Frelia, we strive to keep every
moving part of our bodies in battle-
ready condition. Every muscle counts.$k$pBut, I've worked this tongue enough
chatting. All that's left now is to
prove your resolve to me.$k$pWait a minute, where are you going?
Ahh... Maybe you do have pretty
strong legs after all...
Can't let our guard down.
For King Hayden!
Rrrah!
My strength is unmatched!
I was prepared for this...
I am Gilliam. Been stationed on the eastern front of Frelia. Good to meet you.
Looking to arm wrestle, are you? I'll gladly accept.
No other knight in Frelia can match my strength.
I know I've seen many battles, but I'm still pretty young.
I learned a lot in Renais. I expect Askr to be much the same.
Syrene has been with me since her very first mission. She's one of Frelia's finest knights.
I should show you Frelian resistance training. Think it would do you good. Oh, I can teach you—it's no trouble.
*grunt*
You have a plan?
Fortune follow us.
